```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(magick)
library(igraph)
library(png)
```
```{r}
img <- image_read("olin_o.jpg")
img
```

```{r}
img <- image_read("olin_o.jpg")
radius <- 0
sigma <- 1
lower_pct <- 10
upper_pct <- 30
geom_string <- paste(
  radius,
  "x",
  sigma,
  "+",
  lower_pct,
  "%+",
  upper_pct,
  ""
)

edges_img <- img %>% 
  # image_enhance() #%>%
  # image_normalize() #%>%
  image_canny(geometry = geom_string)
  # image_quantize(max = 2, colorspace = "gray", dither = FALSE) %>%
  # image_negate()
edges_img
```



```{r}

x <- edges_img %>%
  image_write(tempfile(fileext='png'), format = 'png') %>%
  readPNG()

```
